EmailTemplate.name: Email Signup Response Contact
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Joining Our Mailing List!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName},
Thank you for your interest in the WaterGrass River Alliance.
You will receive periodic news updates, event invitations, and other information about the WaterGrass River.
You have a standing invitation to become a member of the WaterGrass River Watershed Alliance or to volunteer at any time!
Sincerely, WaterGrass River Watershed Alliance
